title: Getting the Love You Want: A Guide for Couples
description: Originally published in 1988, Getting the Love You Want has helped thousands of couples attain more loving, supportive and deeply satisfying relationships. For this edition of his classic book, Dr Hendrix and his wife, Helen LaKelly Hunt, have added a new introduction describing the powerful influence this book has had on so many people over the years. With its step-by-step program, Getting the Love You Want will help you create a loving, supportive and revitalized partnership.
author: Harville Hendrix
